casebody.data:
George E. KERSEY, Plaintiff-Appellant, v. UNDER SECRETARY OF COMMERCE FOR INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY and Director of the Patent and Trademark Office, Defendants-Appellees. No. 05-1272. United States Court of Appeals, Federal Circuit. April 6, 2007. Rehearing Denied April 27, 2007.

Before SCHALL, Circuit Judge, ARCHER, Senior Circuit Judge, and GAJARSA, Circuit Judge.

Judgment

PER CURIAM.

This CAUSE having been heard and considered, it is

ORDERED and ADJUDGED:

AFFIRMED. See Fed. Cir. R. 36.
